text: Yakub poveril obeshchaniyam i klyatvam synovey. Zhaleya ikh, on posovetoval im v"yekhat' v Yegipet cherez raznyye vorota, chtoby ne privlekat' vnimaniya lyudey, mogushchikh prichinit' im vred. On skazal: "YA bessilen otvratit' ot vas zlo. Tol'ko Allakh - Zashchitnik. On odin mozhet vas spasti, i resheniye - tol'ko ot Nego, i ya polagayus' na Nego. YA vveryayu Yemu nashi sud'by. Ved' tol'ko na Nego polagayutsya te, kto vveryayet Yemu svoyu sud'bu, veruya v Nego
